name: Katana+Shoujo
description:
"She's a girl, she's a sword, she's a sword girl."

Katana+Shoujo, the super pre-alpha demo! Made for Yuri Jam 2016.

Story:

"You wake up, disoriented. Oh, right.

You were about to be hit by a bus. Did it hit you? Are you dead?

As you start to gain more or awareness, you hear a voice near you. Looking down, you see a blue katana.

It was talking.

...Maybe you are dead."

Currently, it's a bit of a dungeon crawler. Also, an RPG, though there's only one currently.

Basically everything is placeholder, and it lacks music/sound effects, but I don't think there's any bugs. If there are, please leave me a comment so I can fix it!

Credits:

Art/Writing/Dubious Coding: Me

RPG system: Cheerymoya
